title: Why I prefer other lanes, but am forced to mid.
body:
The title sounds sketchy, but what I mean is to be honest, I don't even like mid that much.
Sure! you get a lot of map control and can carry a lot of games from there, and a lot of people like mid because very famous pros are known for that role
(Bjergson/Faker for example) But I play a lot of assassin-like champions, and I HAVE to mid with them!

Ahri top? No
Ahri supp? NO!
Ahri jg? NOO 
Ahri adc? REPORTED!!

WHY does the meta have to be like this? can't riot just make some assassin like champion that can play other lanes?
I mean you have kha zix, rengar and nocturne.. that's about it. But if I want to play akali or leblanc I have to mid only.
Now I KNOW it's something I have to deal with, and I also know that a lot of reason why some people mid all the time is because there
favourite champions have no other role other than mid, and even if they do  have a back up role for that champ they'll get flamed in chat for not midding. That's all there is to it.

Who else agrees/understands with me here? I suck at explaining but if you could understand the point I am trying to make, and what are your thoughts on this topic?

replies.body:
The fact is meta exists for a reason, you can beat meta champs by just flat out out skilling your opponent, but otherwise meta champs tend to win out.

As for the meta of the example and Ahri being a mid laner, fact is that is what she is, there's no real point putting her in the jungle cause that's just a pain in the ass for her, playing her top will see tanks shit on you, playing her support can work, same with ADC, but they both work less then her mid laneness.

As for only playing assassin's mid, the reason is simple, because top lane your only options are to assassinate the top/jungle/mid, this limits your options, especially considering top and jungle are going to likely be tanky and be able to survive your burst, mid on the other hand is exactly what an assassin want's because it's easy to roam bot lane that way (which always has one squishy.)

Okay for starters, Ahri, LeBlanc and Akali CAN'T JUNGLE so don't even mention that.
No, they just can't. Doesn't matter what combination of runes/masteries you try, it wont work.

Why don't you take Akali top? Because most champions there will DESTROY HER!

I've said it before many a times, the meta doesn't FUCK you, the meta is very fluid, but you have to LEARN that certain champs just don't fucking work in "non-meta picks".
Now let's take a look at top, why would Akali or Ahri be bad in top lane I wonder? Probably because they'll meet Renekton, what happens then? It's not pretty.

Each position has champions that WORK in that position, other champions can work but it's difficult for them due to the match ups they'll meet, then there are the champions that WONT work at all.

I love that fact that he already clearly stated that Ahri, leblanc and Akali cant jungle, the whole point of his post revolves around the fact that they can only mid, so there really isn't any need to tell him again that they cant jungle, because he does know that, if he didnt he wouldnt be here posting about how they cant, he'd be out there jungling LB.

also he never says that the meta fucks you, his post is saying that its unfortunate that if you are an ADC main you miss out on playing champs like rumble, which is true, i had that problem too, you want to play a certain champ but you don't like the role they play and so you cant play them like you want. He isn't asking to break the meta in any way, he is just stating his disappointment that he cant play his favourite champs in his favourite role. he's allowed to be disappointed, gangplank is one of my favourite champs but i cant play him mid which is my favourite role because he just doesn't go there and i don't like playing top that much, I'm not asking for that to be changed but i am disappointed that he doesn't work as a mid champ.

But you can.

I main jungle, but I have no problem going ADC to play Sivir one of my favourite champs in the game, or mid to play Morgana and Karma.
I fucking hate top, but I still go there without complaint to play champs I want to play there.

Just because you main a role, doesn't mean you can't leave it for five minutes.

im not saying its a problem, i go top and adc a lot to play some champs, the point is:
say i really liked nocturne i just loved what his abilities do and how he looks in his eternum skin etc.
but i really hate the play style of jungling (i don't but this is hypothetical) so playing nocturne means i have to play in a way that causes me to not have fun, not do well and not enjoy the experience of playing nocturne, i would much rather play him as a support champ which is a role i feel comfortable with and enjoy, but i cant do that because he isn't a support and can't go anywhere except jungle, 
so the point that Shocking is making is:
"its a shame you cant play some champs where you want to play them" its a simple point.

hes not asking to change anything or insult anyone, he's just saying that he wants to play ahri in a lane that isn't mid but cant, and is expressing displeasure at that fact.

i really like playing graves, but i really don't like playing adc, and that means i play graves a lot less than other champs because i would rather play karthus mid than play graves bot, and i would make that choice every time. but if graves was a mid champ i would play him a lot more often. it doesn't mean i can never play graves. but it does limit the enjoyment/amount that i play him.
Thank you, you read me like a book.
why you so aggressive man what the fuck did I do to you =(
I'm aggressive because people are stupid, and I have to explain this around 50 times a week.
You sound very pretentious.
Hardly.

akali CAN jungle, she has above average clear speed and her W is a ms boost and slow for opponent for potential counterjungling. yay proved you wrong now i dont have to read the rest of your post cos its probably wrong too get rekt lol

Really? She can?

Hmm interesting since I've gone over it many times with high level players, and even in URF it never worked for them.

So tell me what miraculous bullshit are you doing with your runes/masteries to get her working.

i just have the 6 jungle masteries and go 21-9. runes, you can go ap or ad quints, ad gives vamp so thats good, ad reds, armour yellows, and either 6/3 for flat to scaling mr or flat to scaling cdr. i hope you know how to optimise autoattack resets with her abilities. in fact just with any jungler thats the best thing to do, if you dont know what im talking about.....smh.....you've been missing out
while i personally don't think of alkali as a jungler, and would never take her there myself, i cant deny i have seen it done a lot and often with success.

I really think you need to upskill and learn more than one champion type, and position. There are plenty of champions that suit your assassain play style in the jungle: Shaco, Fizz, Eve, Irelia, Yi, to name a few of the more obvious jungle blades. Outside of those, it requires team work. Of course Ahri isn't really viable anywhere but mid if your team composition follows normal patterns. But say you have a tanky damage dealer mid, or in jungle, there's no reason you can't play her top. Just requires team work.

I've seen plenty of anti-meta picks that work. Learn different champs or play with people who can give you freedom to mix it up.

I never new fizz jungle was a thing? thanks man, I appreciate it. I know Jax works, I tried Zed but eh, people tend to hate me if I screw up a tiny bit just because I picked "zed jg" and hes pretty bad at jg anyway pre 6, but I guess fizz is too.
Zed top is fine, not Zed jungle. But Fizz jungle is viable. His E stops damage, and his W clears camps fast. Your ult does nothing except when ganking.
Ahri Support and ADC is fine... I'm sure you can play her top too, Jungle sort of sucks though.

To be effective, assassins need a) a squishy target to assassinate, and b) enough damage to assassinate them. Damage comes from items(gold) and levels, which can most consistently be obtained in the solo lanes. The easiest targets to assassinate are generally found bot and mid. Hence, assassins are generally most effective when played mid. It's not so simple to just release an assassin built for other roles because they will likely just end up being even more effective if played mid instead

I know what you mean and hopefully with the new mord update we might start to see the meta shift a bit with tanks in the bot lane and such like but the reason that you can't play Ahri ADC is because it just isn't as good as a long ranged AD champ at doing that particular role. Sure it might work on the odd game but it just isn't the best way of managing your resources.
You can play any champion in any role. But just hope your team is understanding and can build a useful non-meta composition. If it's solo queue that's probably not going to happen :)
Soraka jungle might not be the best choice tho.

I do see whee you're coming from, I'm a mid laner myself but i really like: shen, new fiora, kha, aatrox etc as champs, but because top lane isn't the most comfortable for me (I'm not a fan of the "JUMP. ON. FACE. KILL." mindset and play style of most top champs, garen, jax, riven etc) so i don't get a chance to play these champs much, and when i do top, i play Gnar, vlad and gangplank because they play more like mid-laners than top laners sometimes.

i guess the point is that its a shame that some champs can only be played in certain roles and if you don't play that role often you miss out, but there isn't a lot you can do about it, it wouldn't be a fun game if it was just a massive free-for-all i guess.

Meta shmeeta. I personally think the meta can go fuck itself if it could.

Take mid champions to the top lane, it is funny seeing a tanky type top laner get smashed by a AP or hybrid mid laner.

You could even take some ranged AD top, someone with an escape or some CC.

You don't have to follow the meta, but you do have to be good if you are going outside the meta, or just counter pick and stop your lane from farming and getting fed.

But just be warned, players will show their hate towards you if you do not pick a specific champ in a certain lane.

Use it to your advantage, if someone is AD mid, Talon, Zed, Yas and so on, take an AP top, it will actually give you some leeway on your team showing that you are willing to give your team what they need.
